data.title: Raptors Sign Luis Scola
data.meta_description: The Toronto Raptors announced Wednesday they have signed free-agent forward Luis Scola. Per team policy, financial terms of the deal were not disclosed. “Luis is an accomplished NBA and international player. We are thrilled to add his experience and leadership to our team and our locker room,” said Raptors President and General Manager Masai Ujiri. “Luis is a winner wherever he goes.”
